    • Method Detail

      • mockProtocol

        public static <T> T mockProtocol(Class<T> clazz)
        Return a mock object for an IPC protocol. This special method is necessary, since the IPC proxies have to implement Closeable in addition to their protocol interface.
        Parameters:
        clazz - the protocol class

      • doThrowWhenCallStackMatches

        public static org.mockito.stubbing.Stubber doThrowWhenCallStackMatches(Throwable t,
                                                       String pattern)
        Throw an exception from the mock/spy only in the case that the call stack at the time the method has a line which matches the given pattern.
        Parameters:
        t - the Throwable to throw
        pattern - the pattern against which to match the call stack trace
        Returns:
        the stub in progress
